description.original: Makes code blocks collapsible in reader view and edit view as well as enabling scroll-able code blocks.
description.translation: Makes code blocks collapsible in reader view and edit view as well as enabling scroll-able code blocks.

dict..setDesc(\"Icon to show when code block: .setDesc("代码块展开时显示的图标（仅限单个字符或表情符号）")
.setDesc("代码块折叠时显示的图标（仅限单个字符或表情符号）")
dict..setDesc(\"Allow code blocks to scroll h: .setDesc("允许代码块水平滚动而不是换行.")
